title: Niall Horan seen after reigniting Selena Gomez romance rumours
text:
He's been linked to pop princess Selena Gomez and she was even spotted arriving at his house earlier this week.

And Niall Horan was looking dapper as he ventured out in New York City on Thursday as rumours of a new romance continued to swirl.

Niall recently reignited romance speculation with Selena following his split from Hailee Steinfeld.

Selena and Niall are long-time friends who have previously been at the centre of romance rumors.

Insiders insist there's nothing romantic going on between the pair.

'Selena and Niall are not dating and have been hanging out as friends,' a source told E!. 'They have always been good friends and have kept in touch throughout the years.'

Four years earlier the pairing were romantically linked after reportedly putting on a PDA packed display at Jenna Dewan's birthday party.

'Oh my god, no,' she told ET Online of the romance rumors. 'I love him, I always have. He's amazing.'
